Question: In 1479, this person reached his brother Bartolomeo in Lisbon, while continuing trading for the Centurione family.
Hints: This person also explored the northeast coast of Cuba, where he landed on 28 October.
This person, for his part, continued to the northern coast of Hispaniola, where he landed on 5 December.
The Santa María was owned by Juan de la Cosa and captained by this person.
